report.title: For Cluster Headaches
report.author: Travis S
report.bodytext: I am a long time chronic sufferer of cluster head aches. I had recently stumbled upon a website that said LSD or magic mushrooms helped with cluster headaches. I immediately called a friend to get some mushrooms. Before I go further I must state I have tried a lot of RX drugs to try combat the enormous amount of pain I go through daily. /n /n I did the boil water to extract the active ingredients. .1 mushroom to a cup of water drinking slowly over a half hour. It has been a month since I have had a headache, very mild ones maybe twice in the month. I can't describe the absolute bliss I have towards life now. No pills with all the risk! /n /n I am glad I stumbled upon that info. /n The world must know the medicinal effects of mushrooms!!
